{"rule":"ABLE_TO_PASSIVE","sentence":"^\\QA growing volume of political science research have been able to be characterized as \"data science\" projects: they employ large quantities of data, often drawn from a large number of different sources.\\E$"}
{"rule":"ABLE_TO_PASSIVE","sentence":"^\\QA growing volume of political science research have been able to be characterized as \"data science\" projects: they employ large quantities of data drawn from different sources.\\E$"}
{"rule":"TOO_LONG_SENTENCE","sentence":"^\\QSuch project usually requires a notorious bulk of work before analysis, including identifying correct questions or indicators from source databases, merging data in proper manner of time and space, wrangling data into a consistent format, and so on see, e.g., @Lohr2014.\\E$"}
